narrative=Rachel Wheeler, a 16-year-old, was last seen at her home on Ferntower Road, Crieff. narrative=Rachel Wheeler, a 17-year-old with an unspecified medical condition, was reported missing from a gym on Saint Mary's Road, Birnam.
